Pre-Game Insights: The Chicago White Sox (31-104) will attempt to defeat the New York Mets (70-64) on Sunday, September 1, 2024, at Guaranteed Rate Field in Chicago, IL.
The starting pitchers for the game are Sean Manaea for the Chicago White Sox and Garrett Crochet for the New York Mets.
The New York Mets have hit 248 doubles and 171 home runs as a team this season.
The Mets have a team slugging percentage of .420 and have struck out 1,139 times while walking 425 times.
The Mets are earning 4.8 runs per game, which is 10th in MLB, with a team batting average of .249.
The Mets' pitching staff has a collective WHIP of 1.30 and a team ERA of 4.14, with 1,179 strikeouts and 506 walks.
The Chicago White Sox have a team on-base percentage of .278 and a team batting average of .220 this year.
The White Sox have hit 109 home runs and have 397 runs batted in this season.
The White Sox pitching staff has a WHIP of 1.442 and a FIP of 4.65, with 1,109 strikeouts and 528 walks.
The White Sox have allowed 173 home runs and surrender 5.33 runs per 9 innings, ranking 29th in MLB.
